nodes.text: Carosi Eight was a location in the Outer Rim Territories. It was represented at a celebration for the worlds of the Outer Rim on the planet Serenno during the time of the Galactic Republic. While exploring the celebration, Jedi Initiate Dooku and the young Lady Jenza of House Serenno ate lalaren blooms from Carosi Eight.

Carosi Eight was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott, though the exact spelling of its name was not given until the script release of the audiobook.
In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Carosi VIII was first mentioned in the 1992 West End Games sourcebook Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Two, written by John Terra.
